unnormalised: Hey everyone! Athlete bios are my fav! Really inspiring to read about folks like Mithali Raj. How they rose from places like Chennai to reach international fame. Remember "Chak De! India"? Kinda like that, but real life. What are your top 3 athlete bios? Anyone from IIT made it big in sports? Rs. 50 says someone knows! Curious! 10 km run tomorrow!
